disclaimerScreen.heading: Important Disclaimer
disclaimerScreen.subheading: MicroScan AI is designed for microscopy professionals, researchers, students, and enthusiasts
disclaimerScreen.consentAgreement: I have read and consent to the disclaimer.
disclaimerScreen.firstConsent: MicroScan AI does not provide health measurements, diagnoses, or treatment advice, nor is it intended for such purposes. Users of MicroScan AI must apply their clinical judgment and verify information from authoritative sources before making any clinical decisions.
disclaimerScreen.secondConsent: MicroScan AI is not a diagnostic tool, treatment platform, or a replacement for professional medical advice. It offers AI-generated insights to assist healthcare professionals in accessing medical knowledge and analyzing medical images and documents. MicroScan AI is an AI-driven informational and educational app designed more to support licensed healthcare professionals.
disclaimerScreen.fourthConsent: MicroScan AI is not classified as a medical device and does not claim regulatory approval. It is intended for educational and informational purposes to complement professional expertise.
disclaimerScreen.fifthConsent: MicroScan AI does not collect, store, or process personal or patient data. All user interactions are confidential and limited to the scope of the app.

contactUs.heading: Feel free to email us directly, and our team will get back to you as soon as possible

PromptSection.message: Your scan is ready! Now, what would you like to find out?

prompts.first: What cell types or structures are present in this image?
prompts.second: Are there any abnormalities or pathogens in this sample?
prompts.third: What is the likely origin or condition of this sample?
prompts.fourth: What insights can you provide from this image?

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.first: 1. Tap the 'Add Square' button to create a selection square.
instructions.second: 2. Drag the square over your region of interest.
instructions.third: 3. Adjust the corners to precisely cover the region.
